org.apache.james.domainlist.api

Interface DomainList

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDomainList, HBaseDomainList, JPADomainList, XMLDomainList

    public interface DomainList
    This interface should be implemented by services which offer domains for which email will accepted.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDomain(String domain)
      Add domain to the service
      boolean containsDomain(String domain)
      Return true if the domain exists in the service
      String getDefaultDomain()
      Return the default domain which will get used to deliver mail to if only the localpart was given on rcpt to.
      String[] getDomains()
      Return array of domains which should be used as localdomains.
      void removeDomain(String domain)
      Remove domain from the service

    • Method Detail

      • getDomains

        String[] getDomains()
                    throws DomainListException
        Return array of domains which should be used as localdomains. Return null if no domain is found.
        Returns:
        domains
        Throws:
        DomainListException

      • containsDomain

        boolean containsDomain(String domain)
                       throws DomainListException
        Return true if the domain exists in the service
        Parameters:
        domain - the domain
        Returns:
        true if the given domain exists in the service
        Throws:
        DomainListException

      • addDomain

        void addDomain(String domain)
               throws DomainListException
        Add domain to the service
        Parameters:
        domain - domain to add
        Throws:
        DomainListException - If the domain could not be added

      • removeDomain

        void removeDomain(String domain)
                  throws DomainListException
        Remove domain from the service
        Parameters:
        domain - domain to remove
        Throws:
        DomainListException - If the domain could not be removed

      • getDefaultDomain

        String getDefaultDomain()
                        throws DomainListException
        Return the default domain which will get used to deliver mail to if only the localpart was given on rcpt to.
        Returns:
        the defaultdomain
        Throws:
        DomainListException
